Cells.message: Grab and hold, then move towards the gun to apply
Cells.name: Crafting: Add attachment

Cells.message: Grab the screwdriver, bring close to attachment, then use to remove
Cells.name: Crafting: Remove attachment

Cells.message: Press the 'SAVE' button to save your configuration
Cells.name: Crafting: Saving

Cells.message: Press a category, then an attachment to spawn
Cells.name: Crafting: Buy Attachment
